summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1252, for the improvement of East Union Street from Thirty-fifth (35) Avenue to Thirty-seventh (37) Avenue; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same by constructing concrete sidewalks; wooden cross-walks and other appurtenances therein, under Ordinance No. 13716 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
